name: Nine Baal (Epic MegaJam 2019)
description:
Pluto is in charge of arranging this  funeral with their beloved cat tethered to their arm with her leash. The cat is desperate for attention and will do what ever it can to be bothersome.  Inspired by life with cats that always want more rubs than hours in the day will allow.

2 player game.
Cat plays on keyboard
WASD - moves cat
Spacebar - uses cat powers.

Pluto plays on Xbox Gamepad.
LAS - move
RAS - camera 
LT - interact with world
RT - interact with cat.

Pluto's objectives require ability to distinguish colors; faltered on accessibility optimization.
